message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. A 60/40 split seems fair for us to get started.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I think a 55/45 split is more reflective of the fact that I'll be taking on more risk as the game goes on.  Let's get this money!
Bob, let's be realistic. I came down from my initial offer, and this split still gives you a significant share.  We're losing money with every round.
Alice, we're cutting this close!  I'm bumping my offer up to show I'm serious about ending this. 52/48 is my final offer.  Don't let the money disappear!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair solution at this point.  We're both losing out if we continue this.
